subject: [Mhln] Windows XP OEM & Windows XP - difference?
body:
A false enchantment can all too easily last a lifetime.

Men are disturbed not by things, but by the view which they take of them.

We are no more free agents than the queen of clubs when she victoriously takes prisoner the knave of hearts.

A leader has the vision and conviction that a dream can be achieved. He inspires the power and energy to get it done.

I won't be happy till I'm as famous as God.

The artist is the child of his time but woe to him if he is also its disciple, or even its favorite.

Books give not wisdom where none was before. But where some is, there reading makes it more.

Everybody pulls for David, nobody roots for Goliath.

A temporary insanity curable by marriage.

One should not confuse the craving for life with endorsement of it.

If the young knew and the old could, there is nothing that couldn't be done.

He has conferred on the practice of vacillation the aura of statesmanship.

Two things a man should never be angry at: what he can help, and what he cannot help.
